item.title: Level- 6
item.dc:creator: Abhishek Tiwari
item.description: Earn amount of points (300 per day) , Reach a rank (Level 5) and Reach a point balance (Greater than 500 points).
item.content:encoded: Earn amount of points (300 per day) , Reach a rank (Level 5) and Reach a point balance (Greater than 500 points).

item.title: Level- 5
item.dc:creator: Abhishek Tiwari
item.description: Daily visit a specific post (1 time per day) , Get visit on any post (5 times per day) and Unlock a specific achievement (6th achievement per day).
item.content:encoded: Daily visit a specific post (1 time per day) , Get visit on any post (5 times per day) and Unlock a specific achievement (6th achievement per day).

item.title: Level- 4
item.dc:creator: Abhishek Tiwari
item.description: Delete a post ( 1 time per day) , Daily visit website (10 times per day) and Daily visit any post (20 times per day).
item.content:encoded: Delete a post ( 1 time per day) , Daily visit website (10 times per day) and Daily visit any post (20 times per day).

item.title: Level- 3
item.dc:creator: Abhishek Tiwari
item.description: Get a comment (10 times per day) , publish a new post( 3 time per day)
item.content:encoded: Get a comment (10 times per day) , publish a new post( 3 time per day)

item.title: Level- 2
item.dc:creator: Abhishek Tiwari
item.description: Login to our viralnewsbuzz.000webhostapp.com(5 time per day) and comment on post (5 time per day) to get ,this level.
item.content:encoded: Login to our viralnewsbuzz.000webhostapp.com(5 time per day) and comment on post (5 time per day) to get ,this level.
